long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,en,en_AU,zh_CN:
Set your YouTube Video Player; YouTube Content Categories & Filter-rules; Tweaks; Layout, Theme & Style 
all at once today & enjoy that for years to come! With our enhancer you have 175+  useful / unique features🧰🔧. To make your video experience & content discovery a whole lot better & save you a lot of clicks & time. 
✔️ Open-source
✔️ Applies most settings with no reload⌛ (unlike other YouTube-Extensions;  draggable icon on YT)
🍃 lightweight: You can expect everything to work as expected. 
✓ Non-profit & no income since 2012. (Bear with us when YouTube changes. it's been an uphill race and only gets better.)
✓ Video playback features for embedded videos  (+ preparing mobile m.youtube, Facebook,  Netflix, Twitch, Vimeo too)  
(Offline / privacy🔒: We can't care about what video you watch, just that you have a better time). 

🏅Press Reviews:  We are Recommended by FireFox!🦊(🏆Only 98 extensions) 
"Enhances YouTube in meaningful ways"  - (5/5⭐ gHacks.net/2021/03/26/improved-youtube-enhances-youtube-in-meaningful-ways)
"Might be the best YouTube Extension Ever" - (https://LifeHacker.com/this-might-be-the-only-youtube-browser-extension-youll-1846575110)

⋮⚙️175+ features⋮  (many can only be found here /we pioneered)
💡 Expand always: Video Description,  Transcript, Chapters 
🛩️ "Virtual Travel" (Switch your content-country)
✨ Dim pages until hovered ("Zen mode" )
🤖 Auto-Pause Tabs ➕ Auto-fullscreen ➕ Pip Picture
📈 Analyse your activity  🚫 Block Videos, Channels, Tags, Category 
➕ Video tabs volume Mixer🎛️🔊
🗑️ Remove Related Videos  🗑️ Remove Shorts Reel
🗑️ Hide distraction declutter attention (teaching / screenshare / presentation) 
➕ "Up Next": Off (Reset YT's "Autoplay" after every video ) 
♻️ Undo the new Sidebar (Description, details, comments)
🚫 adblocker  (adblock & adskip or white-list ads your channel subscriptions)
➕ Channel: don't play trailer

🎨☕ Themes  
🌈🌄🌇 Disable Ambient lightning (cinematics)
📅 Dark mode Schedule (also Black theme for oLed) ✓ Display dim  ✓ Blue-light filter (Preserve sleepiness. Relax eyes) 

📺 Video Player & Playback Features:
📷 Screenshot (save copy download any video Frame)
⏯️🔁🔀 Extra Player Buttons (optional):  ➰Loop / Repeat  (looper / repeater) ➕ Rotate Video
💡 Subtitles, captions & transcript Options 
🔍 watch videos frame by frame. 
🔄 reverse Playlist, Shuffle Playlist 
🎞️ Expand videos to your full window (expander)
🎞️ theater mode 🎞️ cinema mode (turn off the lights)
🎞️ Resize videos (player Size) 
➕ Default/fixed Video Quality to match your Display 720p 1080p 4k 8k or bandwidth 480p 240p 144p, auto hd, automatic 4K ➕ avoid 60 frames vs. 30 fps   ➕ HDR vs. SDR 
➕ Player Auto-Play: Off
💨 "Speed-watching" (Fixed Default Playback Speed) (smart video speed controller excluding music or education) 
🔊 Fixed Volume or  Loudness normalization 
➕ Popup Player ➕ Custom Mini-Player
➕ Pop-out Player ( "always-on-top (floating popout) needs OS setting / app) 
➕ Deny AV1 codec to speed up Player /save CPU electricity⚡🔌. [Old] GPUs can do [H.264] VP8 VP9 encoding (fast) (H264 h264ify Flash)

🧩⌘+⇧ Youtube Shortcuts: Set any Shortcuts / Hotkeys  (mouse scroll for volume, etc. )  🗑️ Overwrite YT's Shortcuts

🧹🧽🧼
🗑️ Hide YT Comments / fold / collapse 🗑️ Transparent Header 🗑️ Hide Annotations 
🗑️ Hide live stream chat  🗑️Hide video's details
➕Toggle YT Player Controls ➕ set YT language  ➕Tweak YT's "Scroll for details"
✓ Mimic retro classic Theme Style Layout
✓ Mini Player scrolling  ✓ Search inside ✓ Legacy List style
➕ Channel Video counter 
➕ Thumbnails .gif animation: OFF,  Thumbnails: HD 

ⓘ https://github.com/code-charity/youtub    (Twitter @ImprovedTube)
(🌱👪 Community / 140+ Volunteers) 
🌎 translated to 40+ languages     
We'd like to team with Developers for Web-Video & YT Extensions and listed some unique, friendly, cool, smart work on:
 https://github.com/code-charity/youtub/discussions/1881 &  https://improvedtube.com )

🔎Found a bug❓🐞🐛
 - If you notice any issue, need help or wish for a new feature🌟🧚, please post on Github: https://github.com/code-charity/youtub/issues
  We work hard 🏋️👩‍💻 to make your experience a 5/5 Stars experience.
 (We might even read mail & "Support", next to "Reviews". Please don't complain in the Reviews immediately!) 
 ( bugs@improvedtube.com 📧 ideas@improvedtube.com 📧 )

Compatiblity: While you might not lack features for YT with our extension (and some others copy our code),
You can usually just run all else you need, i.e. sponsorblock, pockettube or extra adblocker / adskipper.
(ⓘ YT Extensions work with one permission to access YT, you dont need to accept 'alerts', 'change privacy settings', 'browser history')

ⓘ Not affiliated with YT.  
Independently developed.
long.cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,et,fa,:
Set your YouTube Video Player; YouTube Content Categories & Filter-rules; Themes, Tweaks, Layout & Style 
all at once today & enjoy that for years to come! With our enhancer you have 170+  useful / unique features🧰🔧. To make your video experience & content discovery a whole lot better & save you a lot of clicks & time. 
✔️ Open-source & non-profit since 2012.
✔️ Applies most settings with no reload⌛(unlike other Youtube-Extensions)
✓ Video playback features for embedded videos (+ actually working on Facebook, mobile m.youtube, Netflix, Twitch, Vimeo too)  
🍃 lightweight: You can expect everything to work as expected  
(Offline / privacy🔒: We can't care about what video you watch, just that you have a better time). 

🎖️Press Reviews:    "Enhances YouTube in meaningful ways"  (5/5⭐ https://www.gHacks.net/2021/03/26/improved-youtube-enhances-youtube-in-meaningful-ways )
 - We are now   "Recommended by FireFox"!🦊 ONLY 109 extensions🏆)
- "Might be the best YouTube Extension Ever" (https://LifeHacker.com/this-might-be-the-only-youtube-browser-extension-youll-1846575110)

 ⋮⚙️⋮ 85+ features for YouTube ⋮ (some can only be found here / we pioneered)
💡 Video Description: Expand always  
💡 Transcript always 💡 Chapters always
💡 Subtitles, captions & transcript Options
🛩️ "Virtual Travel" (Switch your content-country)
♻️ Undo the new Sidebar (Description, details, comments)
📈 Analyse your activity
🚫 Block Videos, Channels, Tags, Category 
✓ Blue-light filter (Preserve sleep. Relax eyes) ✓ Display dim 
🗑️ hide distraction declutter attention / teaching screenshare presentation 
🗑️ Remove Related Videos 
🚫 adblocker  (adblock & adskip or white-list ads your channel subscriptions)
✨ Dim pages until hovered ("Zen mode" for Youtube)
🎨☕ Themes & Dark mode Schedule (also Black theme for oLed) 
🔄 reverse Playlist, Shuffle Playlist 

🔍 watch video frame by frame.
electriciy emoji   ⚡🔌

📺 Video Player & Playback Features:
⏯️🔁🔀 Extra Player Buttons (optional):  ➰Loop / Repeat  (looper / repeater) ➕ Rotate Video
  📷 Screenshot (download print save a video Frame)  
🧩⌘+⇧ Shortcuts: Set any Shortcuts / Hotkeys   ( including mouse scroll for volume or anytthing)  
💨 "Speed-watching" (Fixed Default Playback Speed) (smart video speed controller excluding music or education) 
🌈🌄🌇 Disable Ambient lightning (cinematics)
➕ Video Volume Mixer🎛️🔊
🎞️ Expand videos to your full window (window expander)
🎞️ theater mode cinema mode (turn off the lights) 🎞️ theater mode
🎞️ Resize videos (Youtube player Size ) 
➕ Default/fixed Video Quality to match your Display 720p 1080p 4k 8k or bandwidth 480p 240p 144p, auto hd, automatic 4K ➕ avoid 60 frames vs 30 fps   ➕ HDR vs. SDR 
➕ Player Auto-Play: Off
🔊 Fixed Volume or  Loudness normalization 
➕ Auto-Pause Tabs ➕ Auto-fullscreen ➕ Popup Player ➕ Custom Mini-Player
➕ Pip Picture in Picture  ➕ Pop-out Player ( "always-on-top (floating popout) needs OS setting / app) 
➕ H264 codec (h264ify to speed up Player /  save CPU electricity⚡ (H.264 encoding is faster, efficient in GPUs designed before 2016, then VP8 VP9 AV1 (Flash)

🧹🧽🧼
🗑️ Hide YT Comments / fold / collapse 🗑️ Remove Header 🗑️ Hide Annotations 
🗑️ Hide live stream chat 🗑️ Overwrite YT's Shortcuts 🗑️Hide video's details
➕ "Up Next": Off (Reset YT's "Autoplay" after every video ) 
➕Toggle YT Player Controls ➕ set YT language  ➕Tweak YT's "Scroll for details"

ⓘ https://github.com/code-charity/YouTube
 • 🌱👪 Community, 140+ Volunteers:  
• https://improvedtube.com • Twitter: @ImprovedTube

🌎 translated to 40+ languages 
 
We'd like to team with Developers for Web-Video, YT, Extensions, etc.  (please join us on Github)    
They make unique, friendly, cool, smart features (as listed on https://improvedtube.com)

🔎Found a bug❓🐞🐛
 - If you notice any issue, require help, or wish a new feature🌟🧚, please post on Github. Or even write a mail or use "Support" next to "Reviews". (Please don't complain in the Reviews immediately!) We work hard 🏋️👩‍💻 to make your experience a 5/5 Stars experience.   
https://github.com/code-for-charity/ImprovedTube-for-YouTub/issues
( bugs@improvedtube.com 📧 ideas@improvedtube.com 📧 )

Changes
✔️ Search in the extension ✓ Menu suits Touch (more space) ✓ Legacy List style
➕ Thumbnails .gif animation: OFF,  Thumbnails: HD 
➕ draggable ImprovedTube icon on YouTube
✓ Mini Player scrolling 
➕ Channel home page: "featured content" (vs channel intro trailer)
➕ Channel Video counter 
✓ Mimic retro classic YouTube Theme Style Layout

Compatiblity:  You CAN just try what you need (i.e. sponsorblock / or an extra adblocker / adskipper (most YT Extensions work with one permission  "access YT"), yet with this extension, you don't lack features for YT (and some copy our code)  (And you dont need to accept 'alerts', 'change privacy settings', 'browser history')

We are not affiliated with YouTube.
Independently developed since 2012©️
